vlive.korean: 수많은 사람들이 숙청되고 희생이 됐어요. and many more people who were purged and had to make sacrifices. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <그물> 김기덕 라이브 인터뷰 ' Kim Ki-Duk Live Interview'
